name: identification_authentication_verify_identities_of_users_and_processes
title: Identification & Authentication
description: Identification & Authentication (Verify identities of users and processes)
purpose: To ensure that only authorized individuals and processes gain access to systems, data, and resources by accurately verifying their identities. This helps prevent unauthorized access, enhances accountability, and protects sensitive information from misuse or compromise.

item.text: Do you have a device inventory spreadsheet?
Manage service accounts carefully by assigning minimal privileges and regularly reviewing their usage to prevent misuse.
Maintain an up-to-date list of all devices connected to the network to track and manage authorized hardware

extension.valueString: Any additional notes, remediation plans, or implementation challenges...

item.text: Identify information system users, processes acting on behalf of users, or devices.
Set and enforce strong password rules to ensure users and processes securely verify their identity before accessing systems.

valueCoding.display: Yes, for all users and systems
Users required to change on first login

item.text: Number of failed attempts before lockout:
Implement procedures to detect, respond to, and limit the impact of failed authentication attempts to protect against unauthorized access.

extension.valueString: Any additional notes, remediation plans, or implementation challenges...

item.text: Authenticate (or verify) the identities of those users, processes, or devices, as a prerequisite to allowing access to organizational information systems.
